newsitem.title: FRANCE: Pau air freight and mail traffic down in Jan/Sept.
newsitem.headline: Pau air freight and mail traffic down in Jan/Sept.

text.p: Airfreight handled at Pau-Pyrenees Airport totalled 903.9 tonnes in the first nine months of 1996, down 1.9 percent on the same period last year, airport authority figures showed.

Air France Europe, a unit of Air France, generates the major part of cargo traffic handled at Pau Airport while other airline operators include fellow French carriers, Air Littoral and Regional Airlines.
Postal traffic handled at Nice Airport in the first nine months of the year declined by 7.5 percent on 1995 levels at 930.9 tonnes.
French airline L'Aeropostale carries overnight mail to and from Pau on a regular basis, using 4.5 tonne-capacity Fokker 27 aircraft.
